TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeploymentProgressState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Especifica o estágio atual de uma operação de download do ClickOnce.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState> é passado por meio do <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> membro <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, que é usado pelo <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> eventos. Use os membros dessa enumeração para determinar qual parte do [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] implantação já foi baixada no computador local.
## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir instala a versão mais recente [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo atualizar de forma assíncrona.
[!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingApplicationFiles = int32(2)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] está baixando os arquivos de dados e DLLs que compõem o aplicativo.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingApplicationInformation = int32(1)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] está baixando o manifesto do aplicativo.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingDeploymentInformation = int32(0)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] está baixando o manifesto de implantação.
